info.title: Rapidata Audience API
info.description: The API for the Rapidata Audience service

get.summary: Gets an audience by its Id.

parameters.name: audienceId
parameters.description: The id of the audience to get.

post.summary: Starts recruiting users for the specified audience.

post.description: An audience is a group of users that are trained to solve particular tasks.

get.summary: Queries all rapids for the specified audience.

post.summary: Adds a new rapid to be used to train users for the specified audience.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme

OAuth2.description: OAuth2 authorization header using the Bearer scheme
